abstract.p: Balfour Beatty PLC announces having acquired Integral Technologies Inc for approximately $50 million (S)

block.p: Balfour Beatty P.L.C., an international engineering, construction and services group, said yesterday that it had acquired Integral Technologies Inc. for up to $50 million. Integral, a privately held company based in Indianapolis, Ind., develops digital imaging software and products for the security industry. Balfour Beatty, a British company, will pay $30 million in cash upon completion of the acquisition, with a further $20 million payable against the achievements of agreed financial targets.
